com.airg.android.permission

Class PermissionsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.airg.android.permission.PermissionsHandler

  • public final class PermissionsHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class streamlines all the runtime permissions boilerplate and allows your Activity, Fragment, or Compatibility Fragment to implement the Marshmallow runtime permissions by implementing a simple interface. This implementation is based on a talk that I gave in Vancouver Android Developers group. It is functional, but needs more work. Be sure to relay the results from the Activity.onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]), Fragment.onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]), or android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback#onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]) to your PermissionsHandler instance.

      • check

        public void check(int requestCode,
                  @NonNull
                  java.lang.String... permissions)
        Start permission check.
        Parameters:
        requestCode - A request code for use when checking permissions. Your Activity
        permissions - permissions to check (constants from Manifest.permission
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the permissions list is empty or another request is currently in progress. It's a good idea to call abort() from your onPause() method to abort any unfinished requests.

      • abort

      • onRequestPermissionsResult

        public void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode,
                                       java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                       int[] grantResults)
        Call from your Activity.onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]), Fragment.onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]), or your Fragment.onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]). It is safe to call this method even with request numbers that don't match what was provided to check(int, String...) as they are simply ignored.
        Parameters:
        requestCode - premission check request code
        permissions - list of permissions
        grantResults - list of grant results
